#summary How to build the toolchain.

=HOWTO=

* Check out the current source from SVN.
{{{
$ cd odcctools
$ ./configure --target=arm-apple-darwin --disable-ld64
$ make
$ sudo make install

$ cd ../csu
$ sudo mkdir -p /usr/local/arm-apple-darwin/lib
$ sudo cp crt1.o bundle1.o dylib1.o $HEAVENLY/usr/lib/libc.dylib /usr/local/arm-apple-darwin/lib/

$ cd ..
$ TARGETOPTIONS="--with-gxx-include-dir=/usr/include/c++/4.0.0 --build=$TRIPLE --host=$TRIPLE --target=arm-apple-darwin --enable-sjlj-exceptions --with-ld=/usr/local/bin/arm-apple-darwin-ld --with-as=/usr/local/bin/arm-apple-darwin-as --with-heavenly=$HEAVENLY"
}}}
